heading: HR00849
0:
A RESOLUTION TO PAY HOMAGE TO THE FALLEN SOLDIERS WHO PERISHED
WHILE AIDING FAMILIES AFFECTED BY COVID-19 PANDEMIC AND CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST TERMS THE DEPLORABLE ATTACK AGAINST THESE SOLDIERS BY THE NEW PEOPLE’S ARMY
principal-authors: LIMKAICHONG, JOCELYN SY; PADUANO, JOSEPH STEPHEN S.; ARROYO, MA. LOURDES T.; BENITEZ, JOSE FRANCISCO "KIKO" B.; CUEVA, LEO RAFAEL M.; FERRER, JULIET MARIE DE LEON; SAGARBARRIA, MANUEL T.; TEVES, ARNOLFO "ARNIE" JR. A.;
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00849
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION TO PAY HOMAGE TO THE FALLEN SOLDIERS WHO PERISHED WHILE AIDING FAMILIES AFFECTED BY COVID-19 PANDEMIC AND CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST TERMS THE DEPLORABLE ATTACK AGAINST THESE SOLDIERS BY THE NEW PEOPLE’S ARMY
